name: Stay at Home (itch) (bun_tired)
description:
"...We can't be friends.
"Because we're the same person."

"Stay at Home" is a short RPG Maker game, where your future self wants to stop you from school.

FEATURES
* Play time around two minutes.
* You can actually escape this time :)
* Whole another Euler to talk to! (Why would you, though...)
* Three endings to explore.

POSSIBLE TRIGGER WARNINGS
* Depiction of blood and death (Nothing graphical).
* Stupid kids with guns.
* Toxic asshole named GROWN UP EULER.

CREDIT
SE by Alexander

Made in August of 2022.
Available in English\Русский. 
03.
